sentence.Network_en: Don't blurt out this piece of news.
Oh ! One doesn't blurt these things out to people.
sentence.Network_cn: 噢,这种事情可不能随便跟人说的.

sentence.Network_en: You can even blurt out sentences while you a shower!
sentence.Network_cn: 你甚至可以在洗澡的时候脱口而出句子.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新编大学英语单词表(第三册) - 豆丁网 ... billfold n. 皮夹子 blurt v. 脱口而出 coffin n. 棺材.
新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... blurb ? n. 简短的公告 blurt ? vt. 突然说出，冲动的说出 blush ? v. n. 脸红.
最新GMAT词汇精选 - 豆丁网 ... blunt a. 不利的，钝的；直率的 blurt vt. 冲口说出,突然说出 bonus n. 奖金，补贴，额外津贴.
英语词汇综合宝典 ... 327 blurb n. 大肆宣传 328 blurt v. 未加思索地冲口说出, 突然说出 329 bluster v. 风狂吹,咆哮,汹涌.

list.abs: the amount of sentences blurt out determines your English level .英语水平的不是单词量，而是句子量！
Shocked , I blurted out that you had to have sex to have children ., 当我大吃一惊时 , 我脱口说出你必须发生性关系才会有孩子.
Don ' t blurt out this piece of news ., 这消息别嚷嚷出去.
Peter blurted out the news ., 彼得不慎说出了秘密.

entry.def: If someone blurts something, they say it suddenly, after trying hard to keep quiet or to keep it secret.

example.ex: 'I was looking for Sally', he blurted, and his eyes filled with tears.
example.tran: “我当时正在在找萨莉”，他脱口而出，眼里噙满了泪水。

auth_sentence.content: I blurt out, 'You're a helluva long way from the pituitary, man!
auth_sentence.res_content: I blurt out, 'You're a helluva long way from the pituitary, man!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I blurt out, 'You're a helluva long way from the pituitary, man!

auth_sentence.content: This occasionally happens at parties I mentally instruct myself not to say a specific thing and then, of course, blurt it out.
auth_sentence.res_content: This occasionally happens at parties I mentally instruct myself not to say a specific thing and then, of course, blurt it out.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This occasionally happens at parties I mentally instruct myself not to say a specific thing and then, of course, blurt it out.

auth_sentence.content: When speaking, characters quip, chortle, sniff, blurt out, cackle, huff, pipe up and chime in.
auth_sentence.res_content: When speaking, characters quip, chortle, sniff, blurt out, cackle, huff, pipe up and chime in.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When speaking, characters quip, chortle, sniff, blurt out, cackle, huff, pipe up and chime in.

means.word_mean: 突然说出, 脱口而出

sentences.en: He blurted out the truth, that he committed the crime.
sentences.cn: 他不慎说出了真相, 说是他犯了那个罪。
